articles.description: Ukážeme si, jak lze využít nástroj nazvaný Memory profiler pro sledování využití paměti aplikacemi, které jsou naprogramovány v jazyku Python. Tento nástroj dokáže sledovat i synovské procesy vytvořené v měřené aplikaci.
articles.title: Sledování využití paměti Pythonovských aplikací nástrojem Memory profiler

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: ALEF-CSIRT)
articles.description: V pravidelných pondělních bezpečnostních postřezích se podíváme na úspěch operace MEDUSA, ransomwarový dekryptor White Phoenix, Phishing-as-a-Service službu a kritickou zranitelnost v tiskových serverech.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: spyware Snake přišel o hlavu při operaci MEDUSA

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Projekt Fedora zvažuje přidání Fedora Onyx mezi oficiální edice své linuxové distribuce. Nové vydání živé linuxová distribuce Voyager Live přichází s klientem ChatGPT. Ubuntu 23.04 podporuje jednodeskový RISC-V počítač VisionFive 2.
articles.title: Fedora Onyx jako oficiální edice, mobil vyrobený z Raspberry Pi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: jose_d)
articles.description: V článku s poněkud clickbaitovým titulkem GPT-4: True Cognition or High-Tech Plagiarism? ukazuje Bruce Bassett, profesor z Univerzity v Kapském Městě, schopnosti jazykového modelu GPT-4 na řešení hlavolamu.
articles.title: Může ChatGPT „myslet“ sám za sebe?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: OpenAI včera vydalo aplikaci ChatGPT pro iOS. Časem bude i pro Android. Aplikace je zdarma a obsahuje i Whisper, tedy převod mluveného slova na text. Pokud chcete pracovat s novým GPT-4, potřebujete předplatné Plus (20 dolarů za měsíc).
articles.title: ChatGPT jako aplikace pro iOS, bude i pro Android

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Byla vydána verze 2.39 kolekce nástrojů util-linux. Nejvýznamnější změnou je zřejmě podpora nového rozhraní API pro připojování souborových systémů, které umožňuje řadu nových funkcí, včetně připojování s mapováním ID. To dovoluje bez změny souborového systému přemapovat informace o uživatelích a skupinách podle přání správce. Hodí se to například u kontejnerů nebo při stěhování disků mezi různými operačními systémy, kde nesedí uživatelé s vlastníky souborů.
articles.title: Util-linux 2.39 přináší nové připojování souborových systému s přemapováním UID a GID

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Získejte obecný přehled o současných technikách strojového učení a naučte se programovat základní řešení ML pomocí open-source knihoven Sciki-Learn a TensorFlow v jazyce Python. Absolvujte ucelenou pětidenní sérii workshopů strojového učení, kde nejsou potřeba žádné předchozí znalosti umělé inteligence.
articles.title: Bootcamp strojového učení: praktické aplikace z oblastí zpracování obrazu, textu a časových řad (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V programu KeePass byla objevena zranitelnost, která dovoluje útočníkovi získat hlavní (master) heslo a s ním i přístup k heslům. Zranitelnost byla označena jako CVE-2023–32784 a nachází se v aplikaci KeePass pro Windows ve verzích starších než 2.54. Vznikla už také utilita KeePass 2.X Master Password Dumper, která umožňuje problém zneužít a heslo získat.
articles.title: KeePass 2.X Master Password Dumper umožňuje získat heslo do KeePassu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po vydání distribucí RHEL a AlmaLinux 9.2 z minulého týdne je tu také Rocky Linux stejné verze. Jedná se o komunitní klon distribuce Red Hat Enterprise Linux, se kterou je Rocky kompatibilní. Nová verze je k dispozici pro architektury x86_64, AArch64 a s390×. Verze pro ppc64le má problémy se sestavením, proto se její vydání zdrželo.
articles.title: Byl vydán Rocky Linux 9.2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Technický výbor Debianu vyhlásil nové moratorium na přesouvání souborů z kořenového adresáře do adresáře /usr, které je nezbytnou součástí projektu UsrMerge. Tuto změnu provedla většina distribucí, ale Debian s ní má větší potíže.
articles.title: Debian opět pozastavil slučování /usr

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Většina počítačových programů generuje logy – tedy zprávy a záznamy o své činnosti. ELK Stack – ElasticSearch, Logstash, Kibana – je populární nástroj, který umí logy efektivně zpracovávat, ukládat a zpřístupňovat.
articles.title: ELK Stack: naučte se Elasticsearch, Logstash a Kibana (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: PeoplePath)
articles.description: Dne 31. května 2023 od 18:00 společnost PeoplePath pořádá IT workshop s názvem AI manéž aneb jak zkrotit (nejen) ChatGPT. Akce se koná v salonku v 1. patře v restauraci U Salzmannů v Plzni. Drobné občerstvení a pivo jsou samozřejmostí a vstupné je zdarma.
articles.title: ITWorkshop v Plzni: AI manéž aneb jak zkrotit (nejen) ChatGPT

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Operační systém Tails v nové verzi neobsahuje mnoho novinek. Tou hlavní je přítomnost nástroje curl pro příkazovou řádku s podporou stahování skrze HTTPS, FTP i další protokoly. Tvůrci Tailsu o něm hovoří jako o alternativně k jinak obvyklému wget, kdy Tails prohání veškeré prováděné přenosy přes síť Tor. Kdo chce použít curl na úrovni lokální sítě, nechť využije  /usr/bin/curl.
articles.title: Tails 5.13 přináší curl

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Pět let od vydání Ubuntu 18.04 již uběhlo a nyní dne 31. května 2023 skončí standardní doba podpory této staré verze. Uživatelé mají několik možností, co s tím.
articles.title: Standarní podpora Ubuntu 18.04 LTS končí za pár dnů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Open-source správce her Lutris má novou verzi 0.5.3. Ta vedle obligátní podpory účtů herních platforem jako Steam, Epic Games, GOG, různých emulátorů a dalších obchodů s hrami navrací pro Windowsové tituly schopnost běhu přes Proton (tvůrci doporučují držet se Lutrisových buildů Protonu, kdy v základu nyní používají buildy od Thomase Cridera (GloriousEggroll) z Red Hatu, jednoho z vývojářů Wine).
articles.title: Lutris 0.5.13 je svižnější, obsahuje vlastní build Protonu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Desátý ročník konference LinuxDays začal přijímat přednášky. Pokud máte co říct, můžete už teď přihlásit své téma. Organizátory zajímají především témata týkající se Linuxu, open source, sítí, bezpečnosti, vývoje a podobně. Mezi návštěvníky jsou jak začátečníci, tak i velmi zkušení odborníci. Nemusíte se tedy bát přidat své téma.
articles.title: Přihlaste přednášku na LinuxDays 2023

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vysocí představitelé Microsoftu se prý snaží přimět Mozillu, aby neprodlužovala smlouvu s Googlem a odpříště byl výchozím vyhledávačem ve Firefoxu Bing. Toto není poprvé, co za těch 18 let v IT žurnalistice tuto zprávu vidím, vrací se s železnou pravidelností takřka pokaždé, když se blíží konec smlouvy Googlu s Mozillou.
articles.title: Opět: Microsoft chce s Bingem nahradit Google ve Firefoxu jako výchozí vyhledávač

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Linuxových systémů přibývá, každý den se spouštějí nové servery a někdo se o ně musí starat. To znamená spoustu různých dovedností specifických právě pro linuxové prostředí. Jak to zprovoznit, kudy bezpečně dovnitř, co tam najdeme, jak se o to postaráme a jak to nastavíme nebo rozšíříme.
articles.title: Naučte se používat Linux správně a bezpečně (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Celkem 20 dalších výrobků podporuje projekt Coreboot v nové verzi 4.20. Nechybí mezi nimi mnohé desky, které pohánějí Google Chromebooky, stejně jako notebooky od System76 či referenční deska Intel Archer City pro Xeony Sapphire Rapids a různé starší stroje jako výše uvedené dva notebooky. Podporovány jsou:
articles.title: Coreboot 4.20 s podporou Dell Latitude E6400 či HP EliteBook 2170p

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Téměř 6 a půl miliónů dolarů na dotacích, nárůst počtu placených vývojářů z 15 na 24 a z dotací celé čtyři pětiny jdoucí právě na vývoj. To je ve zkratce chod projektu „pošťáka z hromové hory“ za loňský rok.
articles.title: Thunderbird v roce 2022: dvojnásobné dotace, počet vývojářů výrazně vzrostl

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Letos v únoru se diskutovalo odstranění z linuxového jádra staré architektury Intel  Itanium/IA-64, kterou již nikdo nevyrábí a patrně velmi málo lidí používá. Poté diskuse v LKML trochu usnula.
articles.title: Zmizí už Itanium/IA-64 z jádra a grubu?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Red Hat minulý měsíc oznámil propouštění asi 4 % svých zaměstnanců. Mezi nimi byl i Ben Cotton, programový manažer Fedory. Ben napsal o svém propuštění na blogu.
articles.title: Red Hat propustil i programového manažera Fedory Bena Cottona

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Pokud máte Minecraft Java Edition stále s účtem Mojang, je potřeba účet zkonvertovat na účet Microsoft. Jak a proč tomu tak je jsme psali před třemi lety.
articles.title: Pokud nekonvertujete svůj účet Minecraft do září, můžete o něj přijít

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Apple představil ARM procesory M2 Pro v lednu letošního roku. Zatímco jdou do prodeje notebooky MacBook s procesory M2 Pro, Apple oznámil nový procesor M3 Pro.
articles.title: Apple chystá procesory M3 Pro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Sdružení CZ.NIC vydalo třetí experimentální vícevláknovou verzi routovacího démona BIRD. Tato verze je označena jako 3.0alpha2 a jedná se především o opravnou verzi, která řeší řadu problémů se správou paměti a rozložením práce mezi vlákny.
articles.title: CZ.NIC vydal novou experimentální verzi démona BIRD, vývojáři volají po testování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Elon Musk v úterý oznámil, že Twitter bude mít šifrované textové zprávy (DM) mezi uživateli. První verze měla vyjít už ve středu. Elon dále tvrdí, že nebude moci zprávy rozšifrovat a to ani pokud by mu někdo „mířil zbraní na hlavu“.
articles.title: Elon Musk chce z Twitteru udělat univerzální aplikaci patrně s názvem X

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Teprve před dvěma týdny Microsoft oznámil přepsání části Windows do Rustu. Předevčírem Mark Russinovich z Microsoftu, kterého můžete znát ze Sysinternals.com, ukázal první kód v Rustu ve Windows 11 Insider.
articles.title: První Rust kód ve Windows 11

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Lo-fi carnage has never looked so good
The definitive edition of the dark fantasy action game Bleak Sword DX is coming to PC and Switch and it's...on the horizon! In a new trailer, Devolver Digital confirmed the Bleak Sword DX release date for June 8th on both platforms.
Originally released on Apple Arcade back in 2019, the enhanced version will include the original nine chapters in the Bleak Sword campaign and all three DLC chapters.  The gist is that you'll be taking down horrifying monsters across a variety of cursed battlefields with a variety of fierce weaponry and powerful magic.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ArQ5jZDHCSI
It apparently improves the original in every way
The improved version of the game will include a streamlined control system built specifically for PC and Switch. Utilizing the new controls you will be able to execute new attacks, parries, and counters against an enhanced enemy AI. Graphically the game has received graphical enhancements in every aspect. There are new post-processing effects, unique filters, an adaptive depth of field, and more. Particle effects, foliage, and even the weather have seen some improvements as well.
Additionally, Bleak Sword DX features three all-new game modes as well. First is a brand new randomizer campaign modifier that creates a remixed version of the original game. Next is a Boss Run gauntlet where you will face all 12 in-game bosses in a row with only one health bar. Last is an endless arena mode throwing increasingly difficult enemies at you until you suffer defeat. This is all accompanied by the epic score from award-winning composer Jim Guthrie and sound designer Joonas Turner. If you are looking for a challenging but rewarding action romp in a dark fantasy setting, be sure to check out the game when it releases early next month.
A demo for Bleak Sword DX is currently available on Steam!
The post Bleak Sword DX release date is soon appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Bleak Sword DX release date is soon

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Walk on over
Epic Games has revealed the latest freebie for the EGS, and it's none other than the oddball cross-country adventure Death Stranding. Note that this is a full week of freebie availability (through May 25 at 11AM ET), which is a massive step up from the prior "24-hour use it or lose it" promotion that ran in December of 2022. All you need to do is follow the link here (or get it directly through the Epic Games launcher) and you're good to go.
When playing through Death Stranding pre-launch in complete isolation, I had no clue how the general public would respond to it. It was such a bizarre big swing, and perfectly on-brand for Kojima. But even without the Metal Gear name attached, it did fairly well for itself; spreading to multiple platforms beyond its PS4 launch, and a sequel is fully confirmed, amid other multimedia opportunities.
If you haven't played it yet, give it a go! I mean it's free for a week, so even if it's ultra-low on your priority list, you'll probably get around to clicking "forget password" on your lapsed Epic Games account at some point...right?!
What's next for Epic Games Store freebies?
Next up is another "mystery game" that Epic has been hyping for some time now, due out in five days. If you haven't already, bookmark this page and periodically go back to it and redeem whatever is there.
The post Death Stranding is free to keep on PC this week via EGS, and it’s worth taking a punt on appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Death Stranding is free to keep on PC this week via EGS, and it’s worth taking a punt on

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Yahoooooo?
So, how about those May 2023 Switch Online offerings? With Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom taking the world by storm, it would make sense if Nintendo completely forgot about them, but late last night we did indeed get an update: and we're getting not one, not two, but three Mario GBA games for the Switch Online + Expansion Pack catalog.
This isn't much of a surprise, as Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3 was released in February for Expansion Pack subscribers, so this is just completing the set. According to Nintendo, all three games are due out on May 26, and it seems like this is what we're getting for the month.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nRyFVwRqUKI
Are these Mario GBA games worth playing?
As someone who owned all three on the GBA when they came out: kinda!
Mario Advance 1 is likely going to be one of the more popular picks, as it transforms Super Mario Bros. 2 quite a bit: remixing the game's layouts in clever ways while adding challenges. But the art and audio styles are polarizing, and ultimately, as the game goes on, you notice less and less of those stark changes: to the point where some people just prefer to play the original (which is on Switch via the NES app).
That sentiment also applies to Super Mario World and Yoshi's Island, which are both on the SNES Switch app, but there are plenty of GBA-version fans out there who might sway you on those.
Yeah but can we get any version of Four Swords on Switch though?
This is a perfect opportunity for Nintendo to re-release Four Swords on the Switch: which arrived back in 2002 thanks to the "The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Four Swords" GBA release. We'll also settle for the Four Swords Anniversary edition that came to the DS in 2011 (and the 3DS in 2013), and if they can spare the time; a remaster/remake of Four Swords Adventures from the GameCube, which would play nice with the multi-system local play nature of the Switch.
The post A trio of Mario GBA games are coming to Switch in May appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: A trio of Mario GBA games are coming to Switch in May

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Do you think they'll follow through?
In case you missed it, Take-Two's newest financial report had a lot of bullish claims, championed by current CEO Strauss Zelnick. In addition to targeting an unprecedented amount of revenue in FY2025, some concerns were raised over specific platforms: most notably, the Switch, and a potential shift to updated current-gen consoles.
Speaking to Gamesindustry.biz, Zelnick notes that they're putting a lot on the line when it comes to their "immersive core" games, which currently consist of WWE 2K24, NBA 2K24...and an "eagerly-anticipated new IP from one of [their] premiere studios." But what about the Switch? Well, that's TBD.
There is...something there, at least. LEGO 2K Drive does indeed launch today on Switch, with the dubious Star Wars Hunters coming later this year following a delay. When asked about future support in FY2025, Zelnick gave a rather muted response, noting: "Yes, I think we'll continue to support it." When pressed about a potential "console refresh" (read: a boosted/souped-up theoretical Xbox Series X or PS5 "Pro"), Zelnick said that "we probably will" see it happen, and that "they [console refreshes] did not affect the business very much," referring to the PS4 Pro and Xbox One X. The Zynga acquisition and faith in the mobile market are also a heavy focus for Take-Two going into the next few fiscal years.
Well, with all that info, it seems like we know where 2K stands going forward. They're taking a "wait and see" approach with Switch, they're focusing on PC, mobile, and Sony/Microsoft consoles, and they won't change much strategically if there's another "half-generation bump." So mostly business as usual.
The post Take-Two boss says he “thinks” they’ll continue to support the Switch after canceling Midnight Suns on it appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Take-Two boss says he “thinks” they’ll continue to support the Switch after canceling Midnight Suns on it

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
If you were having issues with The Closed Door, update your game
Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is out, and it's wowing people with its relatively stable performance, despite its massive additions to the core world map of Hyrule. That said there are still some lingering issues to address, and thankfully, they've been minor thus far.
Version 1.1.1 was released late on May 18, and it fixes a progress-blocking issue with the main story quest The Closed Door. Apparently, some folks were having problems with it "even if they fulfilled the conditions to advance the quest," but now that's fixed, among the classic vague "several issues have been addressed to improve the gameplay experience" line from Nintendo.
Without spoiling anything, The Closed Door is a very early game quest, so if it's bugged, it's super annoying. At the very least it's easy to just do a clean wipe and restart, but simply updating your game to version 1.1.1 is the ideal situation.
You can find the full patch notes below!
Ver. 1.1.1 (Released May 18, 2023) [Full patch notes]
General Updates
Fixed issue where, sometimes, the player could not clear main quest “The Closed Door,” even if they fulfilled the conditions to advance the quest.

If you have already encountered this issue, you will be able to clear the quest by downloading this update data.
Several issues have been addressed to improve the gameplay experience.
The post New Tears of the Kingdom patch fixes a progress bug appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: New Tears of the Kingdom patch fixes a progress bug

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
Even more wizards and legends
The spellcasting roguelite Wizard of Legend is getting a sequel. Wizard of Legend II is a follow-up to 2018's Wizard of Legend, and it's shifting from 2D to 3D.
Announced during today's Humble Games Showcase 2023, Wizard of Legend II is being published by Humble and developed by Dead Mage, the studio behind Children of Morta. The publisher confirmed during today's showcase that Wizard of Legend is now a Humble-owned IP. Original Wizard of Legend developer Contingent99 is "on board" and consulting on the project, according to Humble.
One big difference between Wizard of Legend II and its predecessor is in their style. While you still have the robed rogue mage look, the sequel is opting for an overhead 3D view rather than the pixel 2D style from the first.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CdnI5FGQ2Sg
It sounds like other elements remain similar, though. Up to four players can hop in, maintaining the co-op appeal of the first Wizard of Legend. It's a roguelite adventure, with plenty of spell combinations to explore and interactions to discover. The adventure seems to evolve each time, so it's once again aiming for a run-based dungeon dive.
Becoming legend
There's no planned release date at this point in time, just a confirmation that it's in development and a Steam page. I did like the original Wizard of Legend, so I'm curious to see what Dead Mages makes with the franchise.
I'm also curious to see what Contingent99 could get up to, as well. As much as I like a new take on the Wizard of Legend, Contingent99's action and art were a solid mix. I'm hopeful that team's got something in the works, too.
You can follow and wishlist Wizard of Legend II here.
The post Wizard of Legend II has been announced for PC appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Wizard of Legend II has been announced for PC

articles.author: Timothy Monbleau
articles.description:
It’s been 3000 years
Pokemon Scarlet & Violet came out nearly six months ago, but it's still missing some fan-favorite features. You can insert your favorite “you mean like the feature to run properly?” joke here. Performance issues aside, compatibility with the cloud service Pokemon Home was key among requests from fans. Fortunately, trainers won't have to wait much longer.
The Pokemon Company announced today that Scarlet & Violet will join the Pokemon Home family starting on May 23, at 6:00 PM EDT. This will allow players to transfer Pokemon they’ve caught from all Home-compatible games into Scarlet & Violet. Conversely, users can transfer Pokemon from Scarlet & Violet back into Legends Arceus, Brilliant Diamond & Shining Pearl, and Sword & Shield. For visual learners, the Pokemon Compan…
articles.title: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet will support Pokémon Home on May 23

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
Who cleans up the pineapple under the sea?
PowerWash Simulator is heading to an interesting place to be power washing: an underwater locale. A SpongeBob SquarePants Special Pack will arrive this summer for PowerWash Simulator, bringing the serene cleaning simulation to Bikini Bottom.
The pack was created in collaboration with Nickelodeon, and will include a character model makeover to make the player fit in a bit more with the ocean-floor setting. No exact date has been set yet, but PowerWash Simulator's SpongeBob pack will arrive sometime this summer for $7.99.
Six new maps will arrive as part of the pack. They'll spotlight Conch Street, the Bikini Bottom Bus, the Krusty Krab, the Mermalair, and more. There will also be ten achievements to hunt, and it seems like there's some story behind all the muck that's appeared in Bikini Bottom.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rByUJRGccWE
If nautical clean-up be something you wish
Developer FuturLab says we'll hear more about a release date sometime in the coming weeks, so we'll hopefully know soon when the cleaning crew can head underwater. Still, washing-underwater situation aside, this is a pretty interesting crossover.
Honestly, PowerWash Simulator has really been landing some wild crossovers. It wasn't that long ago that the Final Fantasy VII Remake pack went live. Now, we're going from Midgar to Bikini Bottom. And I've heard fairly good things about the crossovers thus far, too.
PowerWash Simulator really became a surprise hit, finding a chill vibe in a slow, methodical simulator. It's nice to see the team continue adding wild new reasons to keep going back to it.
The SpongeBob SquarePants Special Pack for PowerWash Simulator will arrive for PlayStation, Xbox, PC, and Switch sometime this summer.
The post PowerWash Simulator heads to Bikini Bottom with a SpongeBob SquarePants pack this summer appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: PowerWash Simulator heads to Bikini Bottom with a SpongeBob SquarePants pack this summer

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Return to the Shatterverse
Some good news for fans of the fun and suitably silly animated series, Sonic Prime — Netflix has confirmed that a new season of episodes will be premiering on the streaming service this July.
Premiering back in December of last year, Sonic Prime sees Sonic the Hedgehog thrust into a multiverse known as the "Shatterverse" whereupon he embarks on a series of adventures with various alt-reality versions of his dopey friends, including Tails, Knuckles, Amy Rose, and Rogue.
The first season of dimension-hopping escapades saw The Blue Blur visiting a futureworld, the prehistoric era, a pirate world, and more. Also featured in the series was an entire cavalcade of Dr. Robotnik variants, which had all formed a council with to take over the entire Shatterverse.
https://twitter.com/sonic_hedgehog/status/1658852487854473217?s=20
Running for eight episodes, the show was considered a hit by the Sonic the Hedgehog community, with critics and fans praising the style, animation, scripting. and voice acting on offer, even if the writing was criticized for being a little trite and repetitive. A co-production of Netflix Animation, WildBrain Studios, and Man of Action Entertainment, a total of 24 episodes were commissioned in all, which suggests the new season will feature a further eight adventures, with the remain eight to be screened later this year.
Sonic Prime Season 2 premieres exclusively on Netflix on July 13. Season One is available to watch now.
The post New season of Sonic Prime comes speeding onto Netflix in July appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: New season of Sonic Prime comes speeding onto Netflix in July

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
The game is afoot
Playstack and Color Gray Games' The Case of the Golden Idol is heading to Nintendo Switch. The detective game will arrive on Nintendo's handheld console next week on May 25, 2023.
Both the base game and the recently released DLC, Golden Idol Mysteries: The Spider of Lanka, will be coming to the Switch eShop. The Case of the Golden Idol will go for $17.99, while The Spider of Lanka DLC will cost $5.99.
Publisher Playstack has put up a trailer, showing a little bit about what the game's about and how the Switch version will handle Golden Idol.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shlRIGFUfYc
The Case of the Golden Idol is a detective game where the player is taken through a series of vignettes. Each one centers around a gruesome death, as well as a golden idol that seems to be causing quite a ruckus. The player has to observe the scene, pulling keywords from text and other sources to then fill in answers about what's happened.
Whodunnit?
Color Gray Games' mystery has some clear similarities to games like Return of the Obra Dinn. It's pretty open in terms of letting the player try, fail, and try again to solve the mystery, but having a definite set of options and clear framework might help less investigatively-inclined folks solve their way through it.
I played The Case of the Golden Idol last year in a Discord server with friends, and I can't recommend that format enough. It's an enjoyable game to think through and solve together, and the revelations you uncover case-over-case are pretty great. The art style of Golden Idol is also unlike most other games out there; initially, I was a bit hesitant about it. But over time, the look of Golden Idol grew on me. I haven't played the Spider of Lanka DLC yet, but it's good to see this team is still exploring the world and structures it built for Golden Idol.
The Case of the Golden Idol hits Nintendo Switch on May 25.
The post The Case of the Golden Idol and its DLC are coming to Switch on May 25 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The Case of the Golden Idol and its DLC are coming to Switch on May 25

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Sexy both on AND offline
No More Robots has announced that the FPS spin-off of Hypnospace Outlaw has a release date. Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath: Vengance of the Slayer is dropping on June 1st.
Hypnospace Outlaw was an extremely special game. While it took place in a fantasy reality, it created a loving time capsule of Web 1.0. The developers created various fictional characters to present a very accurate depiction of the internet in its awkward adolescence. It was rather spot on, and I know this because I lived Web 1.0.
One of the characters was this edgy teenager called Zane Lofton. Like many teenagers, Zane lived in a self-centered fantasy land where he was the king of cool. Slayers X is a further exploration of that character, this time through an FPS that he and his friend developed. It looks to drag us by the hair right back to 1998 when teenagers tinkered with Doom and Duke Nukem 3D modding tools.
I also did that, but I wasn’t a teenager yet, so nothing ever came of it aside from a few poorly textured rooms.
https://youtu.be/-bZRPUTNJBc
Zane Rocks
We’ve had plenty of shooters try to recapture the ‘90s to varying degrees of success, but Slayers X might be the first one to try to present itself through the lens of a character living at the time. As such, it’s packed with everything edgy teenagers found cool back then: bad guys, real-world environments, and poop. It’s trite and tacky, and that’s exactly how it should be.
As a fan of everything jank-pop, Slayers X absolutely sings to me. Hypnospace Outlaw still lives in a corner of my brain, and I’ve been excited to see more from the concept. The spin-off was announced a while back, and I was recently wondering if I had somehow missed it. I’m glad that’s not the case, and I can resume being excited.
Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath: Vengance of the Slayer releases on PC June 1. It will also be on Xbox Game Pass the same day.
The post Hypnospace Outlaw spin-off FPS Slayers X releases June 1 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Hypnospace Outlaw spin-off FPS Slayers X releases June 1

Steranka is personally tagged in some of these tweets, and like Destiny developer Bungie often says before they immediately…

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Or you can keep trucking without these creations
There's...a lot to parse in Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, when it comes to the Ultrahand/creation aspect of the game. Now you can basically ignore it entirely, and just beat the game cleanly, like Breath of the Wild. But if you want, there's a ton of tools at your disposal to craft all sorts of helpful vehicles and contraptions that can nudge you along. Hmm, it sure would be helpful if someone could create a database to track them all: well, Twitter user AKREW Daniel Luu did just that!
The site is called ZeldaBuilds.gg, and allows users to sign up and share their own creations, or peruse others for inspiration. It also has a fantastic "materials" section to help break down all of the game's Zonai Devices, in case you're getting overwhelmed. Not every creation uses every possible part; so it's a great way to take stock. And if you get really into it and want to amass a pile of devices to bust out and start creating stuff at any time, there's a handy list of all of the Zonai dispensers right here. Make sure you do not click the "uses" link unless you want a few boss spoilers though!
Orbital Strike Laser Cannon
u/0KdQ6 in tearsofthekingdom


There are some real gems on there
One of the most impressive builds shared around is the "Satellite Laser Cannon," also called the orbital strike laser cannon in some places, which you can see in action above. The gist is that it literally creates an autonomous robot that flies around and lasers enemies mercilessly, essentially as an additional party member. The creator in question above has a ton of battery power to pull it off, so they earned it!
Other handy creations include skateboards, bikes, a combat buggy, planes, and tanks. Oh, and of course, devices for messing with Koroks.
The post There’s a Tears of the Kingdom building database site, and it’s fantastic appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: There’s a Tears of the Kingdom building database site, and it’s fantastic

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Which man? That Man.
Arc System Works has finally lifted the lid on the final Season 2 DLC character headed to the gorgeous scrapper Guilty Gear Strive — And, of no surprise to anybody whatsoever, next week will see the coming of the powerful central figure in the current GG timeline, Asuka R#, more commonly known as "That Man".
The powerful warrior-sorcerer, whose aim to bring peace and pleasance to Earth led to globe-shattering events of biblical proportions, will bring his ethereal skills to the battlefield on May 25. A new trailer showcases what appears to be one of the most complex and technical fighters in franchise history, (and with GG, that's really saying something), who is armed with over 20 spells with which to confuse their opponent, control space, defend against attack and, of course, kick a lotta ass.
You can see That Man in action in the preview below. Yikes.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zpxOjoBDJBY&t=1s
In addition to Asuka R#'s arrival, Guilty Gear Strive Season Pass owners will also receive the new stage Tir Na N0g, as well as two special 25th-anniversary color packs, bringing additional palettes that can be applied to the entire roster of characters. These include a pink-and-white scheme, a neon green-and-white scheme, and finally an orange-and-white scheme. The pink-and-white look will be available to download to all players free of charge.
Finally, Arc System Works confirmed that a third season of content for Guilty Gear Strive is in the works, bringing even more characters, stages, and colors to the hit release. Players can also expect the arrival of the long-long-long awaited update that hopes to bring myriad fixes to the title's frustrating lobby and online issues.
Guilty Gear Strive is available now on PlayStation, PC, and Xbox platforms.
The post Asuka R# finally unveiled as Guilty Gear Strive DLC, Season 3 incoming appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Asuka R# finally unveiled as Guilty Gear Strive DLC, Season 3 incoming

articles.author: Chris Moyse
articles.description:
Publisher targeting an unprecedented $8 billion in revenue
Take-Two Interactive, the parent publisher behind Rockstar Games and the Grand Theft Auto franchise, has announced that it is preparing for what it believed will be a record-shattering fiscal year 2025. The comments were made by CEO Strauss Zelnick in the company's newest financial report.
"Fiscal 2025 is a highly anticipated year for our company. For the last several years, we have been preparing our business to release an incredibly robust pipeline of projects that we believe will take our company to even greater levels of success," said Zelnick.
"In fiscal 2025, we expect to enter this new era by launching several groundbreaking titles that we believe will set new standards in our industry and enable us to achieve over $8 billion in net bookings and over $1 billion in adjusted unrestricted operating cash flow. We expect to sustain this momentum by delivering additional growth in our operating results in fiscal 2026 and beyond."
Considering the obscene amount of money referenced, as well as the supreme confidence delivered in the statement, one can only assume that the fiscal year 2024, (This period denotes the calendar year running from April 2024 to March 2025), will see the studio launch Grand Theft Auto VI, the latest release in a franchise that leaves almost every other gaming franchise in existence kicking in the dust when in comes to both immediate and long term revenue.
When pressed as to whether this number essentially guaranteed the release window for GTA VI, Zelnick was non-commital, but it seems almost impossible for the "industry standard setting" revenue of $8 billion to be reached without some sort of major, and that's major, release. Grand Theft Auto V, a title that is now a decade old, continues to move copies, and currently sits at the 180 million sales mark.
The post GTA publisher Take-Two expects fiscal year 2025 to ‘set new standards’ in the industry appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: GTA publisher Take-Two expects fiscal year 2025 to ‘set new standards’ in the industry

articles.author: Eric Van Allen
articles.description:
New episodes will arrive every other week
Telltale Games is premiering the first episode of The Expanse: A Telltale Series this summer. The first installment will go live on July 27, with more episodes to follow in the weeks after.
The Expanse series will be episodic, with five episodes in total. After the first drops on July 27, each episode will follow two weeks after each other, putting the targeted end date in September.
There's a standard edition for $39.99, or a Deluxe Edition for $44.99 that will give 24-hour early access on PlayStation or Epic, and also future DLC. Yes, Telltale confirms DLC is on the way, though it doesn't clarify what shape that will take.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XzG5WI5ak1g
All part of the churn
This new Expanse series arrives from the revived Telltale Games, under LCG Entertainment. While it's rolled out games like the Shadow Edition of the Batman Telltale series, The Expanse is one the studio has been building up to for a while, in collaboration with Life is Strange: True Colors developer Deck Nine.
Telltale also confirmed that The Wolf Among Us 2, its follow-up to the previous Fable adventure, is delayed into 2024. The shift is to avoid crunch, and move from Unreal 4 to 5, according to an IGN interview at the time.
This will be an interesting one to watch, to see what the new Telltale is putting out. Deck Nine's involvement certainly has me intrigued, as True Colors was a really solid entry in the Life is Strange series, and I'm a fan of The Expanse too. Opting for an episodic structure similar to what old Telltale popularized has me curious about its reception, though. At the very least, it will be weeks between episodes rather than months.
We'll see if the sci-fi drama's gradual rollout works. The Expanse: A Telltale Series premieres on July 27 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Epic.
The post The Expanse: A Telltale Series kicks off its episodic run in July appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: The Expanse: A Telltale Series kicks off its episodic run in July

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Game "Preservation"
Mommy’s Best Games has acquired the IPs of “legendary” arcade developer Occidental Design and is wringing them for every last drop of latent cash by releasing the long-lost Bumpy Grumpy on PC.
Occidental Design was the horrifically disfigured lovechild of Baer Sternmidden and William S. Fushnell, who were behind such controversial classics as Rip 'n' Tear, Xordian Knot, and Hellbombers. Bumpy Grumpy had a regional test back in 1983, but never saw the light of day beyond that. Occidental Design then faced bankruptcy multiple times before giving up in the face of horrible poverty in the early ‘90s.
https://youtu.be/thoJowMHaAQ
For almost all of us, this will be the first time we get to experience Bumpy Grumpy, and it’s actually quite surprising that Mommy’s Best Games was…
articles.title: Mommy’s Best Games unearth “lost” arcade game Bumpy Grumpy on PC
